title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The wind was still tormenting the trees as he sped round Cameron Toll towards Morningside and Merchiston. Taxis and night buses trundled along the street as he raced across roundabouts and junctions.

title: Gone Again
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The wind had died. Around Cameron Toll, one lane was closed because of a fallen tree, council workmen standing around with a chainsaw scratching their heads.
